category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_enable_new_pnum_match_criteria
preference.preference_description: Added as part of GRDVA Phase 3. Used, if a Usage has been given a Red Part Number Match by any criteria the Usage attributes will be given the additional check for EWO_status and if this is new we set the Part Number match from fail to partial pass.
